= New Home =

''The EGit plugin and its companion JGit library have moved to eclipse.org:''

[http://www.eclipse.org/egit/ EGit at Eclipse]

The new Git repositories can be found at the [http://wiki.eclipse.org/EGit/Contributor_Guide EGit contributor guide]

= Limitations =

as of 12. July 2010 EGit breaks symlinks, thus restricting the scope of usability
of Eclipse with integrated Git to more or less Java or projects that are sure
to never encounter symlinks:
See [http://code.google.com/p/egit/issues/detail?id=70&colspec=ID%20Type%20Status%20Priority%20Component%20Owner%20Summary EGit Bug #70]
